title: How Many Calories Are in a Whopper?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a whopper from Burger King, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Whopper?
assumptions: Standard Burger King Whopper: flame-grilled beef patty, sesame bun, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, onions, mayo, ketchup; no cheese or bacon.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, customizations, and serving size. Check Burger King app or labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Whopper contains about 670 kcal and 28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Whopper with cheese?
faqs.a: About 740 kcal for a Whopper with cheese, adding ~70 kcal from the slice.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a standard Whopper?
faqs.a: 51 g carbs, 35 g fat, 28 g protein, with 2 g fiber and 11 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in a Whopper?
faqs.a: Yes, around 980 mg per Whopper, about 42% of daily recommended intake.

faqs.q: How does a Whopper compare to a Big Mac?
faqs.a: A Whopper has ~670 kcal vs. ~590 kcal in a Big Mac; Whopper has more fat but similar protein.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie Whopper?
faqs.a: Opt for no mayo or bun, or choose grilled chicken version to cut ~200-300 kcal.
